name: Choking
steps: Ask if the person can speak or cough.
If not, call emergency services immediately.
Perform 5 back blows between shoulder blades.
Repeat until object is expelled or help arrives.

name: Burn
steps: Remove the person from the source of burn.
Cool the burn under running water for 10 minutes.
Remove tight items around the burn.
Cover the burn with sterile, non-fluffy material.
